mapper.insert: insert into point( userId, activityType, activityId, pointScore, pointType ) values ( UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userId} , '-', '')), #{activityType}, UNHEX(REPLACE(#{activityId} , '-', '')), #{pointScore}, #{pointType} )
mapper.select: select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, sum(pointScore) as pointScore from point group by userId order by userId

select pointId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, activityType, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(activityId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(activityId), 12))) AS activityId, pointScore, pointType, createdDate from point order by userId asc, createdDate desc

select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, sum(pointScore) as pointScore from point where userId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userid} , '-', '')),

select pointId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, activityType, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(activityId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(activityId), 12))) AS activityId, pointScore, pointType, createdDate from point where userId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userid} , '-', '')), order by createdDate desc

select pointId, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, activityType, LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(activityId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(activityId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(activityId), 12))) AS activityId, pointScore, pointType, createdDate from point where userId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userid} , '-', '')), and activityId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{activityid} , '-', '')) order by createdDate desc
